meta.firmPricingHealthContext: 4 of 10 clients are fully on fixed fee. 4 have mixed models with $0-priced services leaking value. 2 are in operational distress (overdue payments, expired contracts). Firms at this stage typically unlock $25K–$50K in annual uplift by consolidating to fixed fee packages.
